mapper.sql: SELECT t.client_id, t.model_sid, t.model_code, t.model_name, t.customer_model_code, t.model_type, t.sku_group_sid, t5.sku_group_name , t5.sku_group_code, t.standard_sku, t6.sku_code, t6.sku_name , t.picture_path, t.down_sku_group_sid, t7.sku_group_code AS down_sku_group_code, t7.sku_group_name AS down_sku_group_name, t.down_standard_sku, t8.sku_name AS down_sku_name, t8.sku_code AS down_sku_code, t.up_down_suit, t.company_sid, t2.company_name, t.customer_sid, t1.customer_name, t.male_female_flag, t.old_young_flag, t.is_create_model_line, t.remark, t.disable_remark, t.STATUS, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.company_brand_sid, t3.brand_name as company_brand_name, t.customer_brand_sid, t4.brand_name as customer_brand_name, t9.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t10.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t11.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name FROM s_tec_model t LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t1 on t1.customer_sid=t.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 on t2.company_sid=t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t3 on t3.company_brand_sid=t.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer_brand t4 ON t4.customer_brand_sid = t.customer_brand_sid left join s_bas_sku_group t5 on t5.sku_group_sid =t.sku_group_sid left join s_bas_sku t6 on t6.sku_sid =t.standard_sku left join s_bas_sku_group t7 on t7.sku_group_sid =t.down_sku_group_sid left join s_bas_sku t8 on t8.sku_sid =t.down_standard_sku LEFT JOIN sys_user t9 ON t.creator_account = t9.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t10 ON t.updater_account = t10.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t11 ON t.confirmer_account = t11.user_name
mapper.insert:
insert into s_tec_model
client_id, model_sid, model_code, model_name, model_type, sku_group_sid, standard_sku, picture_path, up_down_suit, customer_sid, company_sid, male_female_flag, old_young_flag, is_create_model_line, remark, disable_remark, status, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys, customer_model_code,
#{clientId}, #{modelSid}, #{modelCode}, #{modelName}, #{modelType}, #{skuGroupSid}, #{standardSku}, #{picturePath}, #{upDownSuit}, #{customerSid}, #{companySid}, #{maleFemaleFlag}, #{oldYoungFlag}, #{isCreateModelLine}, #{remark}, #{disableRemark}, #{status}, #{handleStatus}, #{creatorAccount}, #{createDate}, #{updaterAccount}, #{updateDate}, #{confirmerAccount}, #{confirmDate}, #{dataSourceSys}, #{customerModelCode},
mapper.delete:
delete from s_tec_model where model_sid in
#{item}
mapper.select: select count(*) from s_tec_model where model_name = #{modelName} limit 1
select count(*) from s_tec_model where model_code = #{modelCode} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into s_tec_model
client_id, model_sid, model_code, model_name, model_type, sku_group_sid, standard_sku, picture_path, up_down_suit, company_sid, customer_sid, male_female_flag, old_young_flag, is_create_model_line, remark, disable_remark, status, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys, company_brand_sid, customer_brand_sid,
#{clientId}, #{modelSid}, #{modelCode}, #{modelName}, #{modelType}, #{skuGroupSid}, #{standardSku}, #{picturePath}, #{upDownSuit}, #{companySid}, #{customerSid}, #{maleFemaleFlag}, #{oldYoungFlag}, #{isCreateModelLine}, #{remark}, #{disableRemark}, #{status}, #{handleStatus}, #{creatorAccount}, #{createDate}, #{updaterAccount}, #{updateDate}, #{confirmerAccount}, #{confirmDate}, #{dataSourceSys}, #{companyBrandSid}, #{customerBrandSid},
